keyword: how many calories in half and half
title: How Many Calories in Half and Half?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in half and half per tablespoon, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your coffee or recipes.
h1: How Many Calories in Half and Half?
assumptions: Standard fluid half-and-half (equal parts milk and cream), per 1 tablespoon (15 ml), no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of half and half contains about 20 calories, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp half and half?
Is half and half high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1.7 g total fat per tbsp, with 1.1 g saturated.

faqs.q: Calories in half and half vs. heavy cream?
faqs.a: Half and half has fewer calories (20 per tbsp) than heavy cream (51 per tbsp).

faqs.q: Does half and half have carbs?
faqs.a: Minimal, around 0.6 g carbs per tablespoon, mostly sugars.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of half and half?
faqs.a: About 315 calories for 1 cup (16 tbsp); scale up from per tbsp values.
